divs: sighting details well, to begin, two of my best friend's and i had been throwing, kicking and passing a football; on the football practice field next to the basketball and elementary school building. we had been there for about an hour. after playing around that long we needed a rest. the time was around 7:45 p.m., we were sitting in the middle of the field on the fifty yard line. we had been sitting there for about 5 minute's when we heard a very loud noise coming from the south. the sun had just went down, you know that dusk time, but you could still see the outline of the tree's just across the street. the keep getting louder and closer, it sounded like 3 or 4 frieght train's coming at us, but there were no train track's near our town. we looked at each other, and exclaimed to each other; i wonder what it is, and just about that time the noise stopped. then we saw the outline of an object coming right at us over the tree's across the street to the south; there was still no noise, and the craft stopped right above us (approximately 40' above us) and you could not feel any wind change or hear any sound at all from the craft. we were mesmerized looking up at the craft, saying nothing, not moving, and barely breathing, to not make any noise. the craft was just hovering over us, it was in the shape of a triangle but not pointed on the end's; the corner's were more rounded, with neon like round blue and yellow light's approximately 3' in diameter. at the center of the craft there was a larger set of neon light's. these light's were round like the light's on the corner's, but there were 4 round graduating down to the center; purple, green, blue, and yellow in the center. they were not blinking. the craft itself was approximately 150' in width, and 225' in length. the craft seemed to be a medium grey color, but that could have been from the time of day; however, we had plenty of time to see all of the underneath and we really believed the color was right. then, all of sudden the craft started moving off very slowly, and when it got just above the gym building it took off very very fast, but there was not a sound. we ran as fast as we could to one of my friend's house, it was about 1\2 a block from the practice field, and took us only about 6 or 7 second's to get there, because you can run much faster when your that scared. and when we entered his home the tv was on, just as we entered the house, a news flash came on channel (kswo) in wichita falls, tex.. they reported that "sheppard air force base" which is 6 mile's north of wichita fall's, had just reported that an unidentified flying object had just flown over the base at a very high rate of speed. the "sheppard air force base" is approximately 38 mile's north of archer city, texas. so, it took us 6 second's to get to the house, and with approximately a 5 second delay for (kswo) to pick up on the info from the air base; that mean's that the craft which was just above us, covered approximately 40 mile's in "1" second. which if my calculation's are correct, the craft would have had to be traveling approximately 2,400 mile's per second, or 144,000 mile's an hour. now, i'm no scientist, but wouldn't an object traveling at that rate of speed through our atmosphere make quite a noise that could be heard well ahead of the craft? plus, when it took off from visiting my friend's and me, there was not a sound of acceleration. we made a promise to each other not to tell anyone about our "ufo" experience. but, this is something you just can never forget, and since that day i have known for sure that there are "et's" out there watching and studying us. the only people that i have divulged this information to is my immediate family (until now), and you may think that i am just another person trying to get a little attention, but i'm sure that if you investigated this "close encounter" with the "sheppard air force base" radar record's back during that time period, and also the (kswo) tv station's record's; you will believe me. however, everything that i have stated in this letter to you; (is the truth and nothing but the truth so help me god). you know, i know a polygraph isn't a 100 percent tool for getting the to the truth, but i would even agree to be given "scopolamine or thiopental sodium", this is my prof to you that all i've stated in this report to you is the truth. may god bless us all
